title: Paying $500+ For All Signed T206 Cards

posts.post_title: Paying $500+ For All Signed T206 Cards
posts.post_content:
I need them all.  I want them all.  Even if I've already got them.  Please send scans of what you've got to [url]SignedT206@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks for looking!

Paul
